name: Curveusdp3CRVVoterProxy
description: This strategy accepts deposits of {{tokens}} tokens obtained supplying either DAI, USDC, USDT (or their wrapped version: 3crv), or USDP to the liquidity pool on Curve here. {{tokens}} tokens are staked in the gauge on Curve to earn CRV rewards. Rewards are swapped for one of the underlying assets and resupplied to the liquidity pool to obtain more {{tokens}}.
